sentences.sentence: He even ordered Angela Raubal out of the Berghof, so that Eva could take over as chatelaine at the place she nicknamed "the Grand Hotel."
sentences.translation: 他甚至让安吉拉·罗波尔搬出了伯格·霍夫别墅，以便让爱娃名正言顺地当上她戏称为“大酒店”的城堡主人。
